title: Wristcam makes video calls a reality on your Apple Watch
content:
If you own a Wristcam, you’ll be happy to know that you can now make video calls from your Apple Watch. Unfortunately, this operation isn’t performed using FaceTime. Instead, you’ll have to rely on the Wristcam app, which means both parties will need to have the app installed in order to perform a video call.

The post Wristcam makes video calls a reality on your Apple Watch appeared first on XDA.
description: You can now make and receive video calls on your Apple Watch thanks to a new software update for the Wristcam.
